text.textblock: American Savings, FSB, Muster, IN; Final Action; Approval of Voluntary Supervisory Conversion Application

Notice is hereby given that on January 11, 1994, the Deputy Assistant Director, Corporate Activities Division of the Thrift Supervision, or her designee, acting pursuant to delegated authority, approved the application of American Savings, FSB, Muster, Indiana, to convert to the stock form of organization. Copies of the application are available for inspection at the Information Services Division, Office of Thrift Supervision, 1700 G Street, NW., Washington, DC 20552, and the Central Regional Office, Office of Thrift Supervision, 111 Wacker Drive, suite 800, Chicago, Illinois 60601-4360.
By the Office of Thrift Supervision.
